WorkGoalHistory.name: WorkGoalHistory
WorkGoalHistory.description: Represents the history of changes to the values in the fields of a WorkGoal. Access is read-only.

Field.description: The name of the field that was changed.

NewValue.description: The new value of the field that was changed.

OldValue.description: The latest value of the field before it was changed.

WorkGoalId.description: ID of the Goal. Label is Goal ID.
